reviews.review_msg: The instructor is nice but the lectures are not so hot and clear. She wants to say a lot in ashort period of time and just goes on and on.. But good TA, Linda just knows a lot and she is very helpful but very hard marker.Still count on her!
He is really helpful but sometimes not clear when it comes to talking about essays and things of that nature. That being said he is very nice and a very good teacher.
